document_data.name: Ito
document_data.mainbody: '''Ito''' was a [[Flaming Fist]] soldier who served the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He did not think highly of [[Wyll]], the adventurer known as Blade of Frontiers. Ito believe Wyll was not trustworthy and no real hero.
document_data.History: Ito was among the Flaming Fist soldiers stationed at or nearby the [[Waukeen's Rest]] when it was raided by the [[cult of the Absolute]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. He along with other soldiers, including Gauntlet [[Yeva]], gave their best efforts to rescue Councilor [[Florrick]] from the inn after it was set ablaze.
